net.cloud.server.event.command

Class CommandReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.event.command.CommandReader

  • public class CommandReader
extends Object
    Despite the name, no this class is not a subclass of Reader. Rather, it takes a BufferedReader and will read lines from it in order to parse commands and have them executed. The execution of commands this way is blocking, all available commands will run before the readCommands() method returns.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private BufferedReader in
      The input that will provide lines of commands
      private PrintWriter out
      Used to send messages back out

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandReader

        public CommandReader(BufferedReader in,
                     PrintWriter out)
        Create a new CommandReader, which will then be able to read commands from the provided input and display results to the provided output
        Parameters:
        in - The input that will provides lines of commands
        out - Where result messages will be sent

    • Method Detail

      • readCommands

        public void readCommands()
        Read all lines available from the input and take action on the commands provided. Results from the execution of the commands will be shown via the provided output. The handling is blocking in nature - this will not return until all of the available commands have been handled.

      • readLines

        private void readLines()
                throws IOException
        Read from the input all available lines and have them handled.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the input could not be read from

      • handleCommand

        private void handleCommand(String commandLine)
        Handle the command passed in. The result of the command is displayed to the output specified during construction of this object
        Parameters:
        commandLine - The entirety of the text for the command

      • messageOut

        private void messageOut(String message)
        Try to write a message to out. If it cannot be written, fails silently
        Parameters:
        message - A message to send back to the user, creator, or whatever
